description.narrative: To ensure that the reformed Common Fisheries Policy includes binding targets for meaningful fleet reductions, such as strengthening legislation to ban fishing in designated areas; establishing scientific guidance as a legal cap on quotas and improving transparency and traceability in the EU's fisheries management and supply chain. Major retailers in Spain and Poland (and beyond) will have developed and implemented seafood sourcing policies by the end of the project. The majority of retailers will have ended the trade in species listed in the national Greenpeace seafood red list or seafood listed in the categories vulnerable and above by the International Union for Conservation of Nature
